long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: AI-driven Chrome extension which helps users to transcribe any voice to text and also translates various languages to English. This tool helps professionals like doctors, paramedics, Nursing homes, Hospital Staff to quickly document by voicing out and which gets converted to text in English format. This tool understands medical terms so thus by helps medical professionals.
